Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Imagery acquired by Amazonia-1 satellite. The image files are recorded andprocessed by Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas Espaciais (INPE) and areconverted to Cloud Optimized Geotiff format in order to optimize its use forcloud based applications. WFl Level 4 (Orthorectified) scenes are beingingested daily starting from 08-29-2022, the complete Level 4 archive will beingested by the end of October 2022.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
aws s3 ls --summarize --human-readable --recursive --no-sign-request s3://brazil-eosats/ | grep "Total Size"
Total Size: 190.4 TiB
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We will use the Boost tool and  graphsplit to make a car file.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Asia other than Greater China, Europe, North America, South America
